players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie's sentiment. Let's be cautious in our voting and ensure we eliminate any potential threats to the town."
You: "I will remain silent tonight as well. Let's see what happens."

Charlie: "I think it's important that we all stay vigilant and work together to identify the culprit behind Bob's death. Let's continue to observe each other closely and communicate openly about any suspicions or concerns."
Diana: "I believe that we should all focus on identifying the true culprit behind Bob's death. Let's continue to communicate openly and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our town."
